name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instruction: Place a step or a box behind you and stand up tall. Position your right foot on top of the step, bend your knees and lower the hips until your left thigh is parallel to the floor. Return to the starting position and repeat.
hints: Keep your back straight, your chest open, and face front. Maintain your balance by engaging your core and keep your weight in the front heel. Breathe in as you lunge and don't let your knee go past your toes.
